mapper.select: SELECT z.idn_zone as key, z.zone_code as value FROM TPA_VZONE_TPA z WHERE z.idn_pipeline_system =#{idn_system} order by UPPER(z.zone_code)

select tgr.idn_user_group as key, tgr.short_name as value from tpa_tuser_group tgr where tgr.idn_user_group_type = (select idn_user_group_type from tpa_tuser_group_type where type_code = 'SHIPPER') order by upper(tgr.user_group_id) asc
select idn_nomination_concept from tpa_tnomination_concept where concept_code = #{concept}
